item.title: The Legate Ecosystem: Accessible High Performance Computing
Home
item.description: About I am a computer science PhD student at Stanford University, working on compilers and parallel programming systems. I am advised by Alex Aiken and Fredrik Kjolstad. Currently, I’m a research intern at Nvidia working with Michael Garland and Mike Bauer on Legate. Before that, I was a software engineer at Cockroach Labs helping to build CockroachDB. I am fortunate to be supported by an NSF Graduate Research Fellowship and an NVIDIA Graduate Fellowship.
